title: Vanilla Pudding
directions: In 8-cup (2 L) microwaveable bowl, whisk sugar, cornstarch and milk; microwave on high for 6 minutes or until thickened, stirring every 2 minutes. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring twice.
Beat eggs; whisk in one-third of the hot milk. Return to bowl; microwave at high for 1 minute or until bubbly around edge, stirring twice.
